customer_sentiment.description: The customer was cooperative and asked questions to understand the payment plan, but also expressed hesitation and requested to call back later to discuss further.

agent_performance: The agent was patient and helpful, providing clear explanations and answering the customer's questions.

timestamped_events.description: The agent introduced themselves and the company.
The customer expressed their intention to make a payment.
The agent disclosed the debt amount and the customer's account information.
The agent offered a payment plan to the customer.
The agent attempted to set up a payment plan with the customer.
The customer expressed frustration with the payment plan options.
The agent attempted to set up a one-time payment with the customer.
The agent confirmed the one-time payment with the customer.
The agent processed the one-time payment.
The agent disclosed the updated balance after the payment.
